name: port8080folio-landing
description: Jose Flores - Technical Advisor Landing Page

scripts.dev: tsc -p tsconfig.browser.json --outDir src --rootDir src --watch & serve src -l 8080
scripts.copy:assets: node -e "import { access, cp, mkdir } from 'fs/promises'; import { constants } from 'fs'; (async () => { try { await access('src/assets', constants.R_OK); await mkdir('dist/assets', { recursive: true }); await cp('src/assets', 'dist/assets', { recursive: true }); } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'ENOENT') { console.error(e); process.exit(1); } } })();"
scripts.build:js: npx shx mkdir -p dist/scripts && esbuild src/scripts/pe.ts src/scripts/theme-toggle.ts src/scripts/analytics.js --bundle --minify --format=iife --target=es2017 --outdir=dist/scripts --entry-names=[name]
scripts.build:css: npx shx mkdir -p dist/styles && lightningcss --minify --bundle --targets ">=0.25%" src/styles/main.css -o dist/styles/main.css
scripts.build:html: npx html-minifier-terser --input-dir dist --output-dir dist --file-ext html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npx shx mkdir -p dist && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:assets && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npx shx mkdir -p dist && npm run copy:html:prod && npm run copy:assets && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html
scripts.watch:css: echo 'Tip: dev serves src/ directly; no CSS bundling/watch needed.'
scripts.watch:js: echo 'Tip: dev compiles TS -> JS via tsc --watch.'
scripts.watch:html: echo 'Tip: dev uses placeholders; dev-env.js sets endpoints locally.'

author: Jose Flores
